reviews.review_msg: Professor Stockie is very enthusiastic about the course topic and knows the material very well. He is willing to help you with assignments during his office hours and responds quickly to emails. Grading is on the strict side, but the exam is very fair.

Great professor. Very accessible and will take the extra time to explain anything you may not understand. Lessons follow an easy to understand progression and lecture notes are clear and easily understandable

A real gem in the math department. His lectures are a bit all over the place, but his tests are so similar to the homework so it makes up for any confusion. Most importantly, he is approachable with any difficult concepts or proofs and will work through them with you till you understand. Take number theory or geometry with him, you won't regret it!

Expects a lot but is quite reasonable in terms of expectations. Like nearly all math classes, you'll need to put in work in order to do well. Textbook is a little lacking in terms of information, so you'll either need to attend all lectures or be disciplined in teaching the material yourself. Very helpful office hours.

Sad to see Dr J receiving all the 1 stars since the pandemic. He recently wrote an article about pandemic difficulties that I hope other students can find and read. I found him empathetic, caring, and extremely passionate about math and further studies. Often I visited him to speak about my academic career and moving forward, I value that time.
the class is fun and even has group project. dont be scared, the projects are drawing comics, dances, writing songs...
